name: War 3010: The Revolution
overview: The Revolution Has Begun! Humanity has suffered under Kyllen rule for nearly 400 years with no hope in sight... Until now. Having seized control of a Kyllen battle fleet, you must now lead a band of rebel warriors as they take their crusade directly into the heart of Kyllen power. Interstellar space has become a deadly battleground where you will control the fate of humanity. The Revolution has begun...
